Package ch.rgw.crypt

Interface Summary
Cryptologist A Cryptologist knows how to create keys and certificates, and encrypt, decrypt, sign and verify byte arrays.
 

Class Summary
Base64Coder A Base64 Encoder/Decoder.
GnuPG A class that implements PGP interface for Java.
JCECrypter  
JCEKeyManager Vereinfachtes API für die Java Kryptographie-Klassen KeyManager stellt die Verbindung zu einem keystore her und lässt auf die darin befindlichen Schlüssel zugreifen.
SAT Secure Authenticated Transmission The Transmitter stores a hashtable in an encrypted and signed wrapper.
X509Cert Class to handle X.509 certificates
 

Enum Summary
Cryptologist.VERIFY_RESULT  
 

Exception Summary
BadParameterException  
CryptologistException
